snippet: The top data protection official said legislation to revamp the system, which has been in the works since 2010, should be passed this year.
lead_paragraph: The top data protection official said legislation to revamp the system, which has been in the works since 2010, should be passed this year.

headline.main: A Nudge on Digital Privacy Law From E.U. Official
headline.print_headline: E.U. Needs to Move on Electronic Privacy Law, Data Protection Chief Says
